summary: REQ-1 appears implemented by updating backend `companyInfo` returned from `getCompanyInfo()` with the new address and phone. REQ-2 appears implemented by updating the Contact UI to use the new address/phone as fallback values when `companyInfo` is unavailable. However, the diff also includes changes/additions not requested, including modifying an explicitly immutable frontend hook and adding project state/migration scaffolding.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified an immutable frontend file (`frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`) despite the BuildRequest constraint not to modify it.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists this file as immutable; the diff shows it as a modified file with content changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Added backend upgrade/migration scaffolding (`backend/migration.mo`) and wired it into the actor (`with migration = Migration.run`) without an explicit requirement to do so.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only allows adding `backend/migration.mo` if an upgrade/state migration is required; the diff introduces a migration module and actor migration wiring, but the need is not established by the request itself.

hallucinated_features.description: Added `project_state.json`, which is not part of the requested address/phone update implementation.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement mentions adding project tracking/state files.
